message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $10,000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love, and I think it's worth every penny. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $10,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for this product.  What do you think?

I understand that $10,000 was a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,250. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me in the middle.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,250 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $8,750.  If that doesn't work for you, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,750. I'm willing to compromise at $9,000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at $9,000, I'll have to consider other options.
